description: This file defines API endpoints related to 'challenges' in a FastAPI application, including listing, creating, and joining challenges. It interacts with a database via SQLAlchemy models and dependencies.

classes.name: ChallengeParticipant
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing a participant in a challenge.

methods.name: list[ChallengeResponse] list_challenges(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list challenges relevant to the current user.

methods.name: ChallengeResponse create_challenge( payload: ChallengeCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Creates a new challenge based on provided data, ensuring group membership if applicable, and auto-joining the creator.

methods.name: None join_challenge( challenge_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Allows the current user to join an existing challenge unless already a participant.
